ygData.subject: Re: decayed bits
ygData.msgSnippet: You do indeed need both a right and left bracer. We got both last night. You also need a left and right boot. Every piece does have 2 parts to it. Pay
ygData.messageBody:
You do indeed need both a right and left bracer. We
got both last night. You also need a left and right
boot.
Every piece does have 2 parts to it.
Pay attention to the Greave pieces though. They look
like arms.

An additional note. WWe happen to be grouped with the
first level 50 SK on our server, Kagal (a Troll) and
as far as i know still the only one and has been for a
while. Anyway..he got both parts to the Breastplate.
He went off to Mistmoore to ckaim his prize. Not that
he needed it, he has PoF BP. But any he messaged us
with the stats.

18AC
10 STA (i think)
3 SV MAgic

Looks like the BE chest

Thats it folks. Nothing all that spectacular. Andi its
NO DROP. So no giving it to your friends.

Thats the only piec4e i have seen or heard of
completed.
We have the parts to the Bracers, but need the Mino
Shackles..thats our next adventure. I'll try to get
screenshots of all that we complete for you folks.


GL

Bathory D'Allatu
--- Chip Paul <cpaul@...> wrote:
> Grant Vanderhule wrote:
> >
> > From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
> >
> > my guess is that every piece of darkforge armor
> requires 2 pieces of
> > decayed: either a left and a right, or in the case
> of the helm and bp, two
> > different decayed pieces of that slot.
> >
>
> I've come to this conclusion as well, but am
> wondering about the
> bracers?
> It wouldn't make sense for them, has anyone found a
> bracer piece, and
> if so was it a bracer, or a left/right bracer?
>
> Xilith
>
